It was quite a sight to behold.  A strong and for all intensive purposes, a=
 rather formidable warrior, gently cradling his newborns with the utmost of=
 care.  His hands support them both from beneath their bodies and their upp=
er torsos, just as a mother would handle them.  

" I know I still have ple=
nty to learn about being a responsible parent.  But I think I'm off to a go=
od start."

Straightshot nods.

" Yep, you are.  But the hard part comes wh=
en they get older and more adventurous.  Your patience is definitely gonna =
be challenged, Tucson.  Trust me. And with them being dragons, you've got y=
our hands full."

Tucson nods.

" I'm sure you're right.  But for now I'm o=
ff that hook.  I wonder how Elita is going to adjust to having younger sibl=
ings around?  For a while, she's been the only young Maximal here.  Now we =
have three.  I think it's important that we introduce her to them but do it=
 in a gradual manner. It may be a lot for her to adjust to all at once."

L=
ocal artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional and digital =
media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any occasion!  =


Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email me at this a=
ddress and we will talk.
